```{r}
rm(list = ls())
if (!require(devtools)){
    install.packages('devtools')
}
devtools::install_github('progenetix/pgxRpi')
library(pgxRpi)
```


#invasive breast carcinoma (NCIT:C9245)
```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg',filters='NCIT:C9245',
                  codematches=T)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq)
```

```{r}
pgxFreqplot(freq, chrom = 21)
```

# I find losses at: 1q, 4, 9, 10q, ~11, 13q, X, 19
